phrases: Where did I put my pass?
Moto, I just remembered some things I need to take care of.
I gave you my final notice this morning.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
I cannot answer the phone right now, but after the beep...
If you lay a finger on her, I will fucking kill you!
The use of cellphones while on the bus is...
What are you planning on doing?
I am going to stop him.
Mizu-chin... it will not be able to breathe if you hug it that hard...
Well, I guess it is okay.
I see... so you found someone to take care of them.
I am going to drop this one off at relative's house next week.
Honestly, I wanted to keep one here.
Who did the other one go to?
Then that means I will still be able to see them again, right?
If you lay a finger on her, I will fucking kill you!
Now that I started thinking about this, it is suddenly become hard to talk...
Mom was hoping you could make some deliveries that were just ordered.
I will take care of them when I get home.
When exactly is in a bit?
We are in kind of a hurry here.
By the way, where are you now?
Where the hell did he go?
Let me say that I have never even touched any of his girlfriends.
So, what is up with this?!
Takeuchi might have learned that it is more fair to outwit someone in a fight...
You worked up quite a sweat running here, did not you?
You did not even consider your best friend betraying you, huh?
Should I teach you some points to assure certain victory in love?
If you try to skip one or the other, it will not work at out all.
Is not loving someone good enough?
In the end, people can only be together with the one they are fated to be with.
If fate is not involved, then I will just make my own.
But... when you fall in love with someone, I want to believe that it is because of fate.
Then you are just lacking the honesty.
I will tell you another good thing.
From what I can remember, they took the puppies and made a right in that direction.
They are probably at the park near the supermarket.
Ayaka, they did not take a right.
They took a left did not they?
Adolescence is so annoying, do not you think?
It is good for them to experience pain while they are young.
If they have strong spirits, they should be able to surpass any difficulties.
No... instead, are not you just having fun with this?
Fight, fight... and become good men, you two.
I-I am getting tired of this already...
I am giving you two time alone, so what the heck are you doing?!
Please, just talk to each other!
She is had her eyes set on him the entire time...
She does not seem to get sick of him...
Mizu-chin totally took up all of my attention, and we have wasted all this time in silence...
I wonder if he took it the wrong way...
I hope I did not make him feel bad...
Why is this even bugging m-
I am such a moron for being so self-conscious about this...
Besides, I am the ex of Takeuchi-kun's best friend.
It is obvious why Takeuchi-kun's being nice to me.
There is no way there is any special meaning to this.
If I took a second to think about it, I would have realized it!
They took the dogs... they took the dogs with them...
Obviously, they would be by the riverbed!
Is not the bus stop that way?
No... it is faster to go this way.
I think the bus should arrive soon.
Takahashi... you might think you have broken up with me, but I do not accept it.
I do not think we have broken up.
You might think you are not good enough, but...
If you are saying that I am not good enough, then I will do whatever it takes!
I will do whatever it takes from now on!
I will do whatever it takes for you!
I will not hold anything back!
Why did you say that now, of all times...?
Since when did you have a dog?
Why do not you take it?
I told you I would kill you if you laid a finger on her.
It is the period of the Warring States again, I guess.
She brought this with her, did not she?
I know because it is like her.
Masa, what were you doing walking around in your school uniform like that?
A lot of deliveries have piled up.
Did you meet up with Moto?
The girl you were with today was his girlfriend, was not she?
Or should I say his ex girlfriend?
You remembered where the bathroom was, so it is your reward.
The bath's all heated up, so go take one.
Do not bring that dog you brought home with you into the bath.
Ah, and you handed in your career search paper all on your own, did not you?
You left the parent/guardian signature line blank...
My career is my own problem, is not it?
Talk to your father about it.
After all... the ones who pay are your parents, huh...?
It would be nice... if you could hurry and see Nana-chan again soon.
Me? I did not say anything like that!
Something like that is not in Disneyland!
Is not it about time to go?
It is time to go to the bathroom!
Your suggestion of Disneyland the other day...
T-They did not approve it at the student council meeting.
I am sorry... it was a really good idea, too...
Apparently, there is a lot of stuff when dealing with the copyright on Disney...
What am I supposed to do?
Hey... do not you think she is a lot cuter with her hair down like that?
I think it is just your imagination.
It is the same hairstyle as when she had me undress her...
Is she trying to get at me...?
When I look at her head during class, I cannot concentrate at all.
YOU-Umm, could you do some painting?
Yano sure is devoted this year!
I can really see your motivation!
That is why I will leave the big job to you!
Were not you the head of the float group?
NEW person in charge and responsible for the cafe
Could you leave it over there?
I actually gave it to him!
I really cannot drink this sweet stuff...
You cannot drink this, can you?
I will drink it for you!
I am busy working on the cafe with the rest of the group.
This is not a fair fight.
Therefore, approaching her is forbidden while working on the school festival.
She did not like you out here, right?
And furthermore, why is the head of the cafe group out here in the courtyard?
There is something I want to talk to you about.
She will find out that I am already slacking off!
Do not you think Takeuchi-kun likes you, Nana?
That is how it looks to me...
You should be able to tell just by looking.
You can be really slow sometimes.
B-But Takeuchi-kun is friends with Yano.
He would not do something like fall in love with his friend's ex.
Takeuchi-kun is not that type of person.
I-If you put it like that, you are pretty persuasive...
What do you plan to do about him?
You even threw him inside for the cafe.
Is not he working his hardest for you?
Are you thinking of starting over at some point?
When he does stuff like this, it bothers me.
Honestly, I do not know how to react to it...
I wish he would leave me alone...
Right now, I want to be alone... and have some time to think.
It does not bug me one bit.
This is still much better than her leaving and not being able to do anything about it.
I will not lose to you.
Mou aitaku natteiru sakki sayonara shita bakari
Kimi no ai ha totemo ookikutte
Kitto heiki watashi dake no kimi ga iru
Kitto heiki watashi dake no kimi ga iru
I already want to see you, even though we just said our goodbyes.
that it wraps me up like the blue sky above.
Even if there are tears coming.
I am sure I will be fine because you are there, the only one for me.
that it wraps me up like the blue sky above.
Even if there are tears coming,
I am sure I will be fine because you are there, the only one for me.
Even though we broke up, I still do not want to hurt him?
She is my girlfriend, so would you please not do that?
How is one able... to forget about the dead?
Who will be left crying, and who will be left laughing?
